verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the second <WH8145> time, while he was yet shut up <WH6113> <WH8803> in the court <WH2691> of the prison <WH4307>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> the maker <WH6213> <WH8802> thereof, the YY <WH3068> that formed <WH3335> <WH8802> it, to establish <WH3559> <WH8687> it; the YY <WH3068> is his name <WH8034>;
Call <WH7121> <WH8798> unto me, and I will answer <WH6030> <WH8799> thee, and shew <WH5046> <WH8686> thee great <WH1419> and mighty things <WH1219> <WH8803>, which thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> not.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, concerning the houses <WH1004> of this city <WH5892>, and concerning the houses <WH1004> of the kings <WH4428> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, which are thrown down <WH5422> <WH8803> by the mounts <WH5550>, and by the sword <WH2719>;

They come <WH935> <WH8802> to fight <WH3898> <WH8736> with the Chaldeans <WH3778>, but it is to fill <WH4390> <WH8763> them with the dead bodies <WH6297> of men <WH120>, whom I have slain <WH5221> <WH8689> in mine anger <WH639> and in my fury <WH2534>, and for all whose wickedness <WH7451> I have hid <WH5641> <WH8689> my face <WH6440> from this city <WH5892>.

Behold, I will bring <WH5927> <WH8688> it health <WH724> and cure <WH4832>, and I will cure <WH7495> <WH8804> them, and will reveal <WH1540> <WH8765> unto them the abundance <WH6283> of peace <WH7965> and truth <WH571>.

And I will cause the captivity <WH7622> of Y'hudah <WH3063> and the captivity <WH7622> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> to return <WH7725> <WH8689>, and will build <WH1129> <WH8804> them, as at the first <WH7223>.

And I will cleanse <WH2891> <WH8765> them from all their iniquity <WH5771>, whereby they have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against me; and I will pardon <WH5545> <WH8804> all their iniquities <WH5771>, whereby they have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and whereby they have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> against me.

And it shall be to me a name <WH8034> of joy <WH8342>, a praise <WH8416> and an honour <WH8597> before all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776>, which shall hear <WH8085> <WH8799> all the good <WH2896> that I do <WH6213> <WH8802> unto them: and they shall fear <WH6342> <WH8804> and tremble <WH7264> <WH8804> for all the goodness <WH2896> and for all the prosperity <WH7965> that I procure <WH6213> <WH8802> unto it.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; Again there shall be heard <WH8085> <WH8735> in this place <WH4725>, which ye say <WH559> <WH8802> shall be desolate <WH2720> without man <WH120> and without beast <WH929>, even in the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and in the streets <WH2351> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, that are desolate <WH8074> <WH8737>, without man <WH120>, and without inhabitant <WH3427> <WH8802>, and without beast <WH929>,

The voice <WH6963> of joy <WH8342>, and the voice <WH6963> of gladness <WH8057>, the voice <WH6963> of the bridegroom <WH2860>, and the voice <WH6963> of the bride <WH3618>, the voice <WH6963> of them that shall say <WH559> <WH8802>, Praise <WH3034> <WH8685> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>: for the YY <WH3068> is good <WH2896>; for his mercy <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>: and of them that shall bring <WH935> <WH8688> the sacrifice of praise <WH8426> into the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>. For I will cause to return <WH7725> <WH8686> the captivity <WH7622> of the land <WH776>, as at the first <WH7223>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; Again in this place <WH4725>, which is desolate <WH2720> without man <WH120> and without beast <WH929>, and in all the cities <WH5892> thereof, shall be an habitation <WH5116> of shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> causing their flocks <WH6629> to lie down <WH7257> <WH8688>.

In the cities <WH5892> of the mountains <WH2022>, in the cities <WH5892> of the vale <WH8219>, and in the cities <WH5892> of the south <WH5045>, and in the land <WH776> of Binyamin <WH1144>, and in the places about <WH5439> Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and in the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, shall the flocks <WH6629> pass again <WH5674> <WH8799> under the hands <WH3027> of him that telleth <WH4487> <WH8802> them, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>.

Behold, the days <WH3117> come <WH935> <WH8802>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, that I will perform <WH6965> <WH8689> that good <WH2896> thing <WH1697> which I have promised <WH1696> <WH8765> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> and to the house <WH1004> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.

In those days <WH3117>, and at that time <WH6256>, will I cause the Branch <WH6780> of righteousness <WH6666> to grow up <WH6779> <WH8686> unto David <WH1732>; and he shall execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgment <WH4941> and righteousness <WH6666> in the land <WH776>.

In those days <WH3117> shall Y'hudah <WH3063> be saved <WH3467> <WH8735>, and Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> safely <WH983>: and this is the name wherewith she shall be called <WH7121> <WH8799>, The YY our righteousness <WH3072>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; David <WH1732> shall never <WH3808> want <WH3772> <WH8735> a man <WH376> to sit <WH3427> <WH8802> upon the throne <WH3678> of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

Neither shall the Kohanim <WH3548> the L'vi'im <WH3881> want <WH3772> <WH8735> a man <WH376> before <WH6440> me to offer <WH5927> <WH8688> burnt offerings <WH5930>, and to kindle <WH6999> <WH8688> meat offerings <WH4503>, and to do <WH6213> <WH8802> sacrifice <WH2077> continually <WH3117>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; If ye can break <WH6565> <WH8686> my covenant <WH1285> of the day <WH3117>, and my covenant <WH1285> of the night <WH3915>, and that there should not be day <WH3119> and night <WH3915> in their season <WH6256>;

Then may also my covenant <WH1285> be broken <WH6565> <WH8714> with David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>, that he should not have a son <WH1121> to reign <WH4427> <WH8802> upon his throne <WH3678>; and with the L'vi'im <WH3881> the Kohanim <WH3548>, my ministers <WH8334> <WH8764>.

As the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064> cannot be numbered <WH5608> <WH8735>, neither the sand <WH2344> of the sea <WH3220> measured <WH4058> <WH8735>: so will I multiply <WH7235> <WH8686> the seed <WH2233> of David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>, and the L'vi'im <WH3881> that minister <WH8334> <WH8764> unto me.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came to Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Considerest <WH7200> <WH8804> thou not what this people <WH5971> have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The two <WH8147> families <WH4940> which the YY <WH3068> hath chosen <WH977> <WH8804>, he hath even cast them off <WH3988> <WH8799>? thus they have despised <WH5006> <WH8799> my people <WH5971>, that they should be no more a nation <WH1471> before <WH6440> them.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>; If my covenant <WH1285> be not with day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, and if I have not appointed <WH7760> <WH8804> the ordinances <WH2708> of heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>;

Then <WH1571> will I cast away <WH3988> <WH8799> the seed <WH2233> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and David <WH1732> my servant <WH5650>, so that I will not take <WH3947> <WH8800> any of his seed <WH2233> to be rulers <WH4910> <WH8802> over the seed <WH2233> of Avraham <WH85>, Yitz'chak <WH3446>, and Ya`akov <WH3290>: for I will cause their captivity <WH7622> to return <WH7725> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH7725> <WH8799>, and have mercy <WH7355> <WH8765> on them.
